thread.title: No Social Security COLA increase in 2016; third time in 40 years
thread.title_full: No Social Security COLA increase in 2016; third time in 40 years - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: No Social Security COLA increase in 2016; third time in 40 years
text: WASHINGTON (AP) -- For just the third time in 40 years, millions of Social Security recipients, disabled veterans and federal retirees can expect no increase in benefits next year, which is unwelcome news for more than one-fifth of the nation's population. ...
